# creatorDefined

**Instance Property**

Creator-defined custom metadata.

## Declaration

```swift
var creatorDefined: [String : String]
```

## Getting the properties

- **author**: The author of this model.
- **description**: A short description of what the model does and/or its purpose.
- **license**: License information for the model.
- **version**: A version number encoded as a string.

items.description: A short description of what the model does and/or its purpose.
